body:
Winter is coming

So… i want to see this all new movies and tv shows but I can’t 🙃 why? You may ask, well because I’m seeing al over again all seasons of Game of Thrones 🤗 right now I’m on season 5 and I can believe all the little details that I missed 🤦🏻‍♀️

blog.name: lady-griffin
blog.title: LadyGriffin's Home
blog.description: A bad idea written down is far better and far more useful to you than a blank sheet of paper and a mythical piece of brilliance that has been stuck in your head out of fear of failure. Go ahead and fail. Then make it better.

tags: I love Arya's epic line in the trailer but I so badly want this to be a response in like a normal or casual conversation
title: Jon & Arya Reunite
body:
Jon: Arya!!
Arya: I know death. He’s got many faces. I look forward to seeing this one.
Jon: …
Jon: …
Jon: …what? (turns to Sansa)
Sansa: Believe it or not, she’s gotten significantly less creepy since she’s first arrived.

dialogue.name: Arya
dialogue.label: Arya:
dialogue.phrase: I know death. He’s got many faces. I look forward to seeing this one.

dialogue.name: Sansa
dialogue.label: Sansa:
dialogue.phrase: Believe it or not, she’s gotten significantly less creepy since she’s first arrived.

tags: เกมล่าบัลลังก์
title: Growing Up ‘Game of Thrones’
excerpt: Maisie Williams and Sophie Turner on their unbreakable sisterhood, surreal teenage years, and the most anticipated finale ever
description:
An excellent article whose main focus is on the Stark sisters: Maisie Williams and Sophie Turner.

But George R.R. Martin had an interesting comment about ASoIaF that some might overlook:

“I’ve been so slow with these books. The major points of the ending will be things I told them five or six years ago. But there may also be changes, and there’ll be a lot added.”

^^^  "them" = David Benioff & D.B. Weiss

^^^  "them" = David Benioff & D.B. Weiss

summary: i’m an arya stan through and through and i will tell you she was smiling bc she admired queen warriors who RODE DRAGONS.... like...
question: i’m an arya stan through and through and i will tell you she was smiling bc she admired queen warriors who RODE DRAGONS.... like idk why ppl think that’s gonna make her instantly like dany, she’s amazed by something she thought was extinct but she’s a stark at the end of the day soooooooo
answer: People obviously confused their headcanons on the show that is very much based on what they want to happen in the story, and what happens in the actual story because most of these head canons make no sense with the characters at play. Arya Stark is as you mentioned, a Stark. She’s one of the characters most motivated by her family. If there is a something that remotely threatens her family, she will have a problem with it. Daenerys, despite some people’s total misunderstanding of the story, is that thing. The small folk that she pays a lot attention to will probably have some problem with her (or at the very least her dragons) and Arya will probably take that to heart. No one in the North even knows if Daenerys is a good leader, and the first thing they’ll hear about her is how she messed up beyond the wall, and she’s going to take that to heart as well. Arya definitely had that fascination for queen warriors like Vysenia who rode dragons when she was a child (in the same way that Sansa had all kinds of feelings about the Targaryens in the stories…) but that won’t blind her from seeing the reality of the situation.

tags: i answered this quite late but before late than never
i don't need to be an arya stan to point out the fact that she's a main character
summary: Do people really think that Arya who loves the smallfolk, interacts with them constantly, loves hearing them talk will be tone...
question: Do people really think that Arya who loves the smallfolk, interacts with them constantly, loves hearing them talk will be tone deaf about their concerns about the dragons.  Everybody but Arya are afraid of them.  She will most definitely consider their concerns.  And why are all the dany stans like saying besties when the clip is about arya.  Why did they have to make it about dany.
answer: I feel like certain people see Arya as a prop to whatever character they like the most. She isn’t there to validate any of our favourite characters because she is a main character on her own with her own thoughts, feelings and story arc. While her and Sansa will work together, they will not agree on everything, and that’s fine because they are not the same person. While Arya and Jon were extremely close, it’s been six/seven years, and she won’t always agree with him, and that’s okay because she’s her own character. Some people tried to make use Arya to prop up Daenerys, going on about how they are going to be best friends not because they liked Arya that much, but just because they wanted their favourite character to have someone from Westoros on her side on everything. Arya is not here to agree with Daenerys on everything. She’s in Winterfell because she wanted to return to her home and reunite with her family. She’s the kind of person who won’t stand for anyone who may even potentially threaten these two things. As you also mentioned, Arya is one of the characters who is most invested in the opinions of the small folk. I don’t doubt that she’ll notice their fears and concerns, and actively try to understand their perpective on the whole matter. I think she’ll try to highlight their perpective and concerns in the actual meetings, and I really hope that the show continues to put an emphasis on that part of Arya. So yeah, Arya is her own character, with her own set of priorities, and these don’t include acting like a glorified servant to anyone, including Daenerys.

summary: So apparently Mountain Dew is partnering with GoT and making cans branded with Arya’s kill list.  “’A Can Has No Name’ is a...
body:
So apparently Mountain Dew is partnering with GoT and making cans branded with Arya’s kill list. 

“’A Can Has No Name’ is a limited-run, special edition MTN DEW can inspired by Arya Stark, her ever-developing kill list, and her time with the Faceless Men, the Braavosi guild of assassins who relinquish their former identities to become ‘no one.’

When warm, the cans appear brandless. Once chilled, they reveal Arya’s iconic kill list, a tribute to those killed and a glance at her remaining targets for the final season. The cans incorporate thermodynamic ink, which is temperature sensitive and allows for colors to change when chilled.”

This is cool! But the description of the specifics of how to get them is so extra (esp the bolded part) I’m dying lmao:

“In order to get a chance to get one of these limited edition “A Can Has No Name” cans, you must tell MTN DEW on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter ‘what you’d sacrifice’ using the hashtags #ACanHasNoName #ForTheThrone, and #MTNDEWsweepstakes.”

“Alternatively, fans can also score one of the limited-edition cans in New York City and Los Angeles in the coming days by finding the ‘Masters of Coin,’ uttering the ancient password, and receiving a coin. The Masters of Coin will then lead them to a designated ground where the coin will dispense a can from the Iron Vending Machine.”

Source

blog.name: apiratecalledav
blog.title: You have a good heart. It’s super annoying.
blog.description: Hullo! I'm Av.  You're cool for looking at my blog. I'm not too active these days but it's pretty much all Harry Potter/Fantastic Beasts with a lot of The Dragon Prince, Game of Thrones, The Lord of the Rings, Downton Abbey, The Hunger Games, Girl Meets World, Avatar: The Last Airbender, The Legend of Korra and pretty much whatever else I feel like talking about.

tags: I don’t wanna be petty but that’s one of my pet peeves
a song of ice and fire
summary: Arya Stark did not survive Harrenhal, the Red Wedding, and the House of Black and White for you to say that she wouldn’t have...
body: Arya Stark did not survive Harrenhal, the Red Wedding, and the House of Black and White for you to say that she wouldn’t have made it in King’s Landing.

reblog.comment: Arya Stark did not survive Harrenhal, the Red Wedding, and the House of Black and White for you to say that she wouldn’t have made it in King’s Landing.

trail.content_raw: Arya Stark did not survive Harrenhal, the Red Wedding, and the House of Black and White for you to say that she wouldn’t have made it in King’s Landing.
trail.content: Arya Stark did not survive Harrenhal, the Red Wedding, and the House of Black and White for you to say that she wouldn’t have made it in King’s Landing.

blog.description: Welcome to the messy mind of an author, English teacher and maybe an adult. I post writing stuff sometimes. Mostly I reblog memes

summary: Me: Oh wow, new pics, very cool! So glad to see so many of my faves :) Me, internally: Where the fuck are JAIME and ARYA????
